name: Deadweight
description: Play as one of many clones condemned to fight each other in perpetuity for the amusement of the robot lord, King Mechanicus.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Vista/XP Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Dedicated VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Deadweight is a randomised arena based survival shooter where you're armed with just a pistol, explosive crates & Sentry Turrets which can be re-positioned around the room. Hunting you down are countless waves of cloned androids for the sadistic amusement of the robot lord, King Mechanicus. Although this game is in it's early build and needs more work, it already shows good potential, and can only get better with more updates.
